advantage_type: Disadvantage: future vote cast against you
conditions: At the next Tribal Council, the person who received the most votes at this Tribal Council will have one vote cast for them already in the urn

Wearer receives one vote at every tribal council they attend. They can break the curse by defecting to the other tribe before an immunity challenge. If they are voted out with the Black Cowry, they must transfer it to a player of their choosing.

Wearer receives one vote at every tribal council they attend. They can break the curse by defecting to the other tribe before an immunity challenge. If they are voted out with the Black Cowry, they must transfer it to a player of their choosing.

The holder of the White Cowrie Shell can choose to negate a vote cast to someone else in the tribe. They cannot negate a vote cast against themselves. The person with the vote negated by the White Cowrie Shell would be the next holder. Valid until F5.
